verses.verse: Surely God <WH430> is good <WH2896> to Israel, <WH3478> to those who are pure <WH1249> in heart. <WH3824>
But as for me, <WH7272> my feet were almost <WH4592> gone. <WH5186> My steps <WH838> had nearly <WH369> slipped. <WH8210>
For I was envious <WH7065> of the arrogant, <WH1984> when I saw <WH7200> the prosperity <WH7965> of the wicked. <WH7563>
For there are no struggles <WH2784> in their death, <WH4194> but their strength <WH193> is firm. <WH1277>
They are free from burdens <WH5999> of men, <WH582> neither are they plagued <WH5060> like <WH5973> other men. <WH120>
Therefore pride <WH1346> is like a chain <WH6059> around their neck. <WH2555> Violence covers <WH5848> them like a garment. <WH7897>
Their eyes <WH5869> bulge <WH3318> with fat. <WH2459> Their minds <WH3824> pass the limits <WH5674> of conceit. <WH4906>
They scoff <WH4167> and speak <WH1696> with malice. <WH7451> In arrogance, <WH4791> they threaten <WH1696> oppression. <WH6233>
They have set <WH8371> their mouth <WH6310> in the heavens. <WH8064> Their tongue <WH3956> walks <WH1980> through the earth. <WH776>
Therefore their people <WH5971> return <WH7725> to them, <WH1988> and they drink <WH4680> up waters <WH4325> of abundance. <WH4392>
They say, <WH559> "How does God <WH410> know? <WH3045> Is there <WH3426> knowledge <WH1844> in the Most High? <WH5945>"
Behold, <WH7563> these are the wicked. Being always <WH5769> at ease, <WH7961> they increase <WH7685> in riches. <WH2428>
Surely in vain <WH7385> I have cleansed <WH2135> my heart, <WH3824> and washed <WH7364> my hands <WH3709> in innocence, <WH5356>
For all day <WH3117> long have I been plagued, <WH5060> and punished <WH8433> every morning. <WH1242>
If I had said, <WH559> "I will speak <WH559> thus; <WH3644>" behold, <WH898> I would have betrayed the generation <WH1755> of your children. <WH1121>
When I tried <WH2803> to understand <WH3045> this, <WH5999> it was too painful for me; <WH5869>
Until I entered <WH935> God <WH410>'s sanctuary, <WH4720> and considered <WH995> their latter end. <WH319>
Surely you set <WH7896> them in slippery places. <WH2513> You throw them down <WH5307> to destruction. <WH4876>
How they are suddenly <WH7281> destroyed! <WH8047> They are completely <WH5486> swept away <WH8552> with terrors. <WH1091>
As a dream <WH2472> when one wakes <WH6974> up, <WH136> so, Lord, when you awake, <WH5782> you will despise <WH959> their fantasies. <WH6754>
For my soul <WH3824> was grieved. <WH2556> I was embittered <WH8150> in my heart. <WH3629>
I was so senseless <WH1198> and ignorant. <WH3045> I was a brute beast before you. <WH929>
Nevertheless, <WH8548> I am continually with you. <WH270> You have held my right <WH3225> hand. <WH3027>
You will guide <WH5148> me with your counsel, <WH6098> and afterward <WH310> receive <WH3947> me to glory. <WH3519>
Whom do I have in heaven? <WH8064> There is no one on earth <WH776> whom I desire besides you. <WH2654>
My flesh <WH7607> and my heart <WH3824> fails, <WH3615> but God <WH430> is the strength <WH6697> of my heart <WH3824> and my portion <WH2506> forever. <WH5769>
For, <WH7369> behold, those who are far from you shall perish. <WH6> You have destroyed <WH6789> all those who are unfaithful to you. <WH2181>

But <WH589> it is good <WH2896> for me to come close <WH7132> to God. <WH430> I have made <WH7896> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH136> my refuge, <WH4268> that I may tell <WH5608> of all your works. <WH4399>
